Northolt Mandeville is an electoral ward in the London Borough of Ealing. The ward was first used in the 2002 elections. It returns councillors to Ealing London Borough Council.
Ealing council elections since 2022
There was a revision of ward boundaries in Ealing in 2022.
2024 by-election
The by-election took place on 10 October 2024, following the resignation of Deirdre Costigan. It was held on the same day as by-elections in Hanger Hill and South Acton.
2022 election
The election took place on 5 May 2022.
2002â€“2022 Ealing council elections
2018 election
The election took place on 3 May 2018.
2014 election
The election took place on 22 May 2014.
2010 election
The election on 6 May 2010 took place on the same day as the United Kingdom general election.
2006 election
The election took place on 4 May 2006.
2002 election
The election took place on 2 May 2002.
